articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: EU calls on US to push exports to counter vaccine shortage - Fox News
articles.description: The European Union called on the United States Friday to start boosting its vaccine exports to contain the global COVID-19 crisis, and said that the U.S. backing of patent waivers would provide only a long-term solution at best.
